devdoc.details: See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2535Note: This facet depends on {ProxyAdminFacet} and {InterfaceDetectionFacet}.

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],(a.details: Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.

params.cuts: The list of facet addresses, actions and function selectors to apply to the diamond.
params.initializations: The list of addresses and encoded function calls to execute with delegatecall.

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.details: Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.

params.cuts: The list of facet addresses, actions and function selectors to apply to the diamond.
params.data: The encoded function call to execute on `target`.
params.target: The address of the contract to execute `data` on.

initDiamondCutStorage().details: Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.

devdoc.title: Diamond Cut (facet version).

DiamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.notice: Emitted when at least a cut action is operated on the diamond.

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],(a.notice: Add/replace/remove facet functions and execute a batch of functions with delegatecall.

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.notice: Add/replace/remove facet functions and optionally execute a function with delegatecall.

initDiamondCutStorage().notice: Marks the following ERC165 interface(s) as supported: DiamondCut, DiamondCutBatchInit.
